summary: The P-51 Mustang was a powerful fighter plane used by the Americans in World War II and the Korean War. Designed by North American Aviation, it was first made for the British. The plane was fast and could fly long distances. It had a strong engine and carried machine guns. The Mustang helped the Allies win many battles and fought against German planes. Later, it was used as a fighter-bomber. Even though jet planes replaced it, the Mustang stayed in some air forces until the 1980s. Today, people love to fly them in air shows.
title: North American P-51 Mustang
